meanings.sent1: My dog piddles on the grass when he pisses.
meanings.sent2: I need to find a restroom quickly before I pisses myself.
meanings.sent3: The toddler giggled as he pisses in the potty for the first time.
meanings.sent4: The rain patters on the roof like a thousand tiny pisses.
meanings.sent5: The sound of water running makes me think of pisses in the stream.

meanings.sent1: It really pisses me off when people talk during the movie.
meanings.sent2: The constant noise from the construction site pisses the neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The mosquito buzzing around my head really pisses me.
meanings.sent4: Her constant nagging is like a mosquito that pisses at my ear.
meanings.sent5: The dripping faucet pisses me off more than anything else in this house.
